articles.content:
Indian Party Leader on Relations of Friendship and Cooperation with WPK 
    Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of India will make positive efforts to develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the Workers' Party of Korea in the future, too. 
 General Secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India A. B. Bardhan said this when DPRK Ambassador Jang Kwang Son paid a farewell call on him on December 29.    
 The Communist Party of India will extend firm solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve reunification, he stressed.
